pr_title: [risk=no] Add additional metadata fields for user/workspace export

timeline.bodyText: nit: I'd prefer the nullable/map/orElse pattern here but I'm not gonna block on that
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: welp this is certainly tedious.  assuming there's no better way or you'd have done it?
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: Indeed - I didn't do the initial implementation or review, but from a quick scan around some of the documentation, it seems that custom names + custom ordering is not very well supported by this CSV library. I would not be surprised if this is the best way (at least, for this library). Will consider digging deeper if we decide to extend the lifespan of this tool further - it may be going away soon'ish with new metrics export plans.
replies.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: FWIW, this was not intended to be a long-lived implementation.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.message: Add additional metadata fields for export

timeline.bodyText: One option is to just write an array of JSON objects and use an off-the-shelf json->csv converter.
timeline.author: jaycarlton
